Stats¶

Stats List¶

Stats summary for median, mean, mode, range, max, min. A query parameter method can be used to limit the results to either mean, median, mode or range only results.

Example¶

GET /api/v1/stats/1?

Response:¶

[
    {
        "age":
            {
                "median": 8,

                "mean": 23.4,

                "mode": 23,

                "range": 24,

                "max": 28,

                "min": 4

            },

    ...

]

Example:¶

GET /api/v1/stats/1?method=median

Response:¶

[
    {
        "age":
            {
                "median": 8,
            },
    ...
]
